A Smarter RC Toy

Have fun with a beautifully designed remote control toy.

Scroll

What makes WebRC smarter?

Read About us

Engineered for Maximum-Funness

By rethinking traditional design, development, and support philosophies, WebRC is able to provide a smarter RC toy experience.

In-House Design

In-House Design
We know RC toys. That's why our skilled, in-house designers are able to offer you the latest technology, most beautiful designs so you always pilot the best the RC toy world has to offer.

Best-In-Biz
Customer Service

Best-In-Biz
Customer Service
We hate companies that don't stand proudly behind their products. This is why we offer you best in business customer service through telephone, email, and our online support portal.

Dollar Prop Club

Dollar Prop Club
Dollar Prop Club couldn't be simpler. Select one of our great air vehicles, pay one low monthly fee, and we send you new propellers right to your door. No more forgetting to buy new propellers. Plus, you get a 25% club discount on all WebRC products.

WebRC Academy

WebRC Academy
Learn how to fly remote control helicopters & quadcopters, how to service your RC vehicles or how to build one yourself.

Buy One, Give One

Buy One, Give One
For every toy purchased, a toy is distributed to someone in need. We're building a company to do good in this world. A company that gets our blood flowing and we're proud of.

Tune-Up Service

Tune-Up Service
If your WebRC needs to be tuned-up, we got you covered. All you have to do is ship your WebRC to our repair center and one of our technicians will inspect it, replace all parts that are out of order, fine-tune it for maximum performance and ship it back to you.

Use WebRC to:

Have tons of fun

Develop fine motor skills

Get into hobby RC

Take aerial photographs

Record aerial video

Learn about engineering

Dollar Prop Club

Great RC flights for only a few bucks a month. Are you ready to join the ranks of our enlightened RC pilots?

Dollar Prop Club couldn't be simpler. Select one of our great air vehicles, pay one low monthly fee, and we send you new propellers right to your door. No more forgetting to buy new propellers. Plus, you get a 25% club discount on all WebRC products.

Choose your RC vehicle:
  • 4 x Propellors
  • Delivered Monthly
  • 25% Club Discount

$1/mo
